mapper.insert: insert into rebbs(rebbsid , usersid , bbsid , contents , addtime ) values(#{rebbsid} , #{usersid} , #{bbsid} , #{contents} , #{addtime} )
mapper.update: update rebbs set usersid=#{usersid} , bbsid=#{bbsid} , contents=#{contents} , addtime=#{addtime} where rebbsid=#{rebbsid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , b.image from rebbs a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid order by rebbsid desc
select a.* , b.username , b.image from rebbs a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid and rebbsid=#{rebbsid} order by rebbsid desc

select a.* , b.username , b.image from rebbs a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid
and a.usersid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{usersid}, '%'))
and a.bbsid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{bbsid}, '%'))
and a.contents like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contents}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
